input_email_body:
Subject: Canon PIXMA MG3620 Connectivity Issue Dear Customer Support Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm writing to address an issue I've encountered with the Canon PIXMA MG3620 printer purchased under my account, . I previously called about a connectivity issue, and I would like to follow up as the problem persists. Despite my network being stable, the printer continues to show as offline You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. I have attempted to follow the troubleshooting steps provided, including restarting my router and printer, checking the network settings, and ensuring the correct drivers are installed, yet without success.

This ongoing issue severely affects my ability to perform daily tasks, as this printer is integral to my work. Any assistance you can provide would be greatly appreciated. I am hoping you can guide me toward a resolution at your earliest convenience.

In case you need to contact me directly, my phone number is My name is Liu Wei.. Thank you for your attention to this matter. Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
